entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
